mapper.select: SELECT menuId AS value,name AS label,pid AS pId FROM tb_menu WHERE type BETWEEN 0 AND 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_menu (menuId, path, component, redirect, title, icon, name, noCache, hidden, type, permission, sort, pid, isFrame, operation) VALUES (#{menuId},#{path},#{component},#{redirect},#{title},#{icon},#{name},#{noCache}, #{hidden},#{type},#{permission},#{sort},#{pid},#{isFrame},#{operation})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_menu SET path=#{path}, component=#{component}, redirect=#{redirect}, title=#{title}, icon=#{icon}, noCache=#{noCache}, name=#{name}, hidden=#{hidden}, type=#{type}, permission=#{permission}, sort=#{sort}, pid=#{pid}, isFrame=#{isFrame}, operation=#{operation} WHERE menuId=#{menuId} and operation=true
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_menu WHERE pid=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_menu WHERE menuId=#{id} and operation=true
mapper.select: SELECT *,pid as parentId,menuId as value FROM tb_menu order by sort
